{"id":989405486,"question_id":2870,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"11 months, 1 week","timestamp":1688830768,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/989405486/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Alternating Subarray","memory":"43.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int alternatingSubarray(int[] nums) {\n        int len = nums.length;\n      \n        int max= -1;\n     \n        Integer p = null;\n         // 2 3 4 3 4\n        \n        //[14,30,29,49,3,23,44,21,26,52]\n        int cnt= 1;\n        \n        int st = -1;\n        for(int i=0; i<len-1; i++){\n            // 0 1 2\n            int cur = nums[i]; // 29\n            int nxt = nums[i+1]; //  49\n        \n            \n            if( (p!=null && cur+p==nxt) ||  p==null && (cur+1==nxt) ){\n                cnt++; //2\n                max = Math.max(max, cnt); // 2\n                \n                if(p==null){\n                    p =-1;\n                }else{\n                    p=-p;\n                }\n                \n                \n                \n            }else{\n                \n                if(p!=null){\n                     i--;\n                    cnt = 1;\n                    p=null;\n                }\n               \n                \n            }\n            \n            // System.out.println(i + \" c=\" + cur + \" n=\" +nxt + \" m=\"+max);\n            \n        }\n                  // System.out.println(\"max=\"+max);\n               return max;\n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-alternating-subarray","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
